title: Severe microphone issues on Pixel XL
content:
Dear All
I'm trying to get someone's support from Google directly. It is impossible to get in contact with a support from Google as I cannot contact the support from phone directly and after trying 100 times via internet, it always redirect em to some information which is really basics. 
By the end of 2016 I bought the first Google Pixel XL for USD 1026 in the UK, after having all Nexus devices before. I'm a long standing Android and Google fan since the first Android phone and Nexus.
After 1 1/2 years I got difficulties with Pixel XL. I could hear the other party on the phone, but they could not hear me. It took me almost 6 month finding out what exactly the problem is. After that I read in the internet/newspaper that a large number of owners are affected. Google Pixel XL has sever microphone issue which cannot be fixed via a software update. The device has a hardware problem, the motherboard has be replaced. Google confirmed the problem officially.
Now I sent my device to teh Repair Center in Germany to be checked and I receive an offer to have the motherboard replaced for USD 381, so In total I would paid USD 1407 for this device. This reply was absolutely disapointing from Google.

This absolutely not acceptable from a customer view. I was not able to find out the root cause within the 2 years guarantee time. I could not use the phoen even for the first 2 years! Google did not infomed me that my device is impacted.  I do not want to pay for any problems not caused by myself, but solely caused by Google. 

I would appreciate your asstance . I would like to get a working phone as soon as possbile. Germany Repair center do not want to help me. They say, I need to adress my issues to Google. They are forwarding me to the internet and there I cannot reach out to Google. There is a class action where the users could file a claim against Google, unfortunately only in the US. 

Thank you in advance and kind regards,
V
